name: Bubbling Beebles
oracle_text: Bubbling Beebles can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Chancellor Rayne canceled the annual beeble roast. I should have married a crueler woman."
—Barrin

name: Bubbling Muck
oracle_text: Until end of turn, whenever a player taps a Swamp for mana, that player adds an additional {B}.
flavor_text: The muck claims a hundred living things for each meager treasure it spews forth.

name: Capashen Knight
oracle_text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
{1}{W}: Capashen Knight gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Few warriors dare to challenge a knight of Capashen. Should one do so, there is one fewer.

name: Capashen Standard
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
{2}, Sacrifice Capashen Standard: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Benalia has no need for peacocks to serve as symbols of vanity. The Capashens strut more proudly than any bird.

name: Capashen Templar
oracle_text: {W}: Capashen Templar gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Their shields are Benalia's outermost battlements.

name: Chime of Night
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Chime of Night is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor_text: Many sent to serve Davvol carried such instruments, as if to remind him who their true masters were.

name: Colos Yearling
oracle_text:
Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
{R}: Colos Yearling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A steed grows with its rider.

name: Disease Carriers
oracle_text: When Disease Carriers dies, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Rath is a disease all its inhabitants carry.

name: Dying Wail
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, target player discards two cards.
flavor_text: This is a world of spiteful wasps that sting and kill even as they die.

name: Elvish Lookout
oracle_text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: Like a masterful quilter, Yavimaya stitches together patches of color to warn its denizens of threats.

name: Fatigue
oracle_text: Target player skips their next draw step.
flavor_text: "Mind if I just lie down right here for a few weeks?"

name: Fend Off
oracle_text:
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: The best defense is to not get hit.

name: Field Surgeon
oracle_text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
flavor_text: Commanders order soldiers to attack. Field surgeons order them to heal. Both are obeyed without question.

name: Flame Jet
oracle_text:
Flame Jet deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: Did the land make the Keldons? Did the Keldons make the land? Or were they simply meant for each other?

name: Fledgling Osprey
oracle_text: Fledgling Osprey has flying as long as it's enchanted.
flavor_text: It isn't truly born until its first flight.

name: Goblin Gardener
oracle_text: When Goblin Gardener dies, destroy target land.
flavor_text: "Grow food in dirt? Save time—eat dirt."

name: Goblin Masons
oracle_text: When Goblin Masons dies, destroy target Wall.
flavor_text: "Goblins build with true zeal—and anything else within arm's reach."

name: Goliath Beetle
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text: The balance of nature dictates that one day humans will be stepped on by bugs.

name: Heart Warden
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {G}.
{2}, Sacrifice Heart Warden: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"In Llanowar, we tend the forest's boughs and branches. In Yavimaya, we are a part of them."
—Rofellos of Llanowar

name: Hulking Ogre
oracle_text: Hulking Ogre can't block.
flavor_text:
"The Keldons' ogre campaign provided more body parts than my meager facility could properly use."
—Gatha, Tolarian renegade

name: Illuminated Wings
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
{2}, Sacrifice Illuminated Wings: Draw a card.
flavor_text: For a moment, Urza thought not of war and destruction, but of the freedom of the skies.

name: Keldon Vandals
oracle_text:
Echo {2}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Keldon Vandals enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: Keldons divide all their spoils into two groups: trophies and catapult ammunition.

name: Kingfisher
oracle_text:
Flying
When Kingfisher dies, draw a card.
flavor_text: It's tastiest when served with the fish it stole.

name: Magnify
oracle_text: All creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The seed torches' pollen gives off light, but the elves find it heightens their senses as well.

name: Marker Beetles
oracle_text:
When Marker Beetles dies, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{2}, Sacrifice Marker Beetles: Draw a card.
flavor_text: In case of emergency, crush bug.

name: Mark of Fury
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has haste.
At the beginning of the end step, return Mark of Fury to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Many Keldon warriors bear the mark of intentional insanity.

name: Mask of Law and Grace
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from black and from red.
flavor_text: The archangels zealously drove Serra's light into every corner of their new home as if their creator still commanded them.

name: Mental Discipline
oracle_text: {1}{U}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Barrin drowned his doubts about Urza's project by delving ever deeper into its details.

name: Metathran Soldier
oracle_text: Metathran Soldier can't be blocked.
flavor_text: Just as Serra crafted angels of light and faith, Urza constructed an army of sorcery and power to resist the coming invasion.

name: Multani's Decree
oracle_text: Destroy all enchantments. You gain 2 life for each enchantment destroyed this way.
flavor_text:
"This is my place of power. Nothing can take root here unless I allow it."
—Multani, maro-sorcerer

name: Phyrexian Monitor
oracle_text: {B}: Regenerate Phyrexian Monitor.
flavor_text: Being one would be an honor, if the word "honor" had any meaning in Phyrexia.

name: Plated Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Most spiders wait patiently for their prey to arrive. Most spiders aren't forty feet tall.

name: Ravenous Rats
oracle_text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.
flavor_text:
"For all the priceless tomes they have destroyed, one would think they would taste better."
—Davvol, Evincar of Rath

name: Reckless Abandon
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Reckless Abandon deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The climax of a warlord's career is always death.

name: Reliquary Monk
oracle_text: When Reliquary Monk dies, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: A thing of Serra's realm exists only by the grace of her followers' faith.

name: Rescue
oracle_text: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Urza, I've discovered more promising students than you and my husband have, combined. And I haven't lost a single one."
—Rayne, Academy Chancellor

name: Rofellos's Gift
oracle_text: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Return an enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand for each card revealed this way.
flavor_text:
"Rise, elf. We are both of Gaea, and thus we are equal."
—Multani, to Rofellos

name: Scent of Brine
oracle_text: Reveal any number of blue cards in your hand. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card revealed this way.

name: Scent of Cinder
oracle_text: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. Scent of Cinder deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

name: Scent of Ivy
oracle_text: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

name: Scent of Jasmine
oracle_text: Reveal any number of white cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each card revealed this way.

name: Scent of Nightshade
oracle_text: Reveal any number of black cards in your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

name: Sigil of Sleep
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Arrows are only one way to remove an enemy.

name: Skittering Horror
oracle_text: When you cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Horror.
flavor_text:
"This monstrosity will do—for now."
—Davvol, Evincar of Rath

name: Slinking Skirge
oracle_text:
Flying
{2}, Sacrifice Slinking Skirge: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Davvol encouraged the skirges; they made excellent sentries and were quite edible if properly seasoned.

name: Solidarity
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+5 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Their commitment to Serra is as solid as any shield.

name: Squirming Mass
oracle_text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text: Only the coldest hearts and the strongest stomachs can stand against it.

name: Taunting Elf
oracle_text: All creatures able to block Taunting Elf do so.
flavor_text: Much to Multani's chagrin, Rofellos gleefully tutored Yavimaya's elves on the rudest and most vulgar words spoken in Llanowar.

name: Telepathic Spies
oracle_text: When Telepathic Spies enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.
flavor_text: "Do try to keep an open mind, would you?"

name: Tormented Angel
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Falling from heaven is not as painful as surviving the impact.

name: Trumpet Blast
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack, but when to stop.

name: Twisted Experiment
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/-1.
flavor_text: Gatha showed remarkable prowess in increasing his subjects' stature. Their lifespans, however, were another matter.

name: Wall of Glare
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Wall of Glare can block any number of creatures.
flavor_text: The blinding barrier served Benalia better than a hundred shields.

name: Wild Colos
oracle_text: Haste
flavor_text: You'll never get a Keldon's goat.

name: Yavimaya Elder
oracle_text:
When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
{2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.
